tweet: Even as Albania deals with the terrible earthquake, I want to congratulate all Albanians on your Independence Day. Albania is a great friend and NATO partner of the United States. I look forward to working with Albania to strengthen our relationship.
I want to wish everyone a very #HappyThanksgiving. May we all come together today and remember the importance of family, friends and community. pic.twitter.com/8euwoIjzke
